attributes.action: draft a Bill to submit all Members of Parliament to the same standards employed by the Home Civil Service with regards to fair and open competition in engaging staff and in claiming all salaries and expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament is funded by the UK tax-payer. As a public body it should provide proper controls under good governance to ensure propriety in the employment of all staff including those that MP's pay salaries and expenses to from public funds. All such salaries and expenses of any amount should be properly accounted for and subject to independant audit. Also, fair and open competition should be introduced for every post within Westminster which is funded from the public purse.
